rules_text:
Incarnate {4}{U}{R} [i](If you cast this for its incarnate cost, as it resolves, merge it over target creature you own as an Avatar. It keeps all abilities from under it.)[/i]
Target opponent may have The End of Infinity deal 4 damage to them. If that player doesn't, you draw three cards.
Flying
Whenever this Revelation attacks, you may cast an unincarnated copy of it. [i](You still pay its costs.)[/i]
